channel.title: Zaragoza International Bridge on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Zaragoza International Bridge on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 34
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 34 - FM-659/Zaragoza road/George Dieter Drive. The FM-659 shield is incorrectly signed as TX-659. Zaragoza Road connects I-10 to the Zaragoza International Bridge into Mexico.

item.title: TX-375 Loop - Exit 48
item.description: TX-375 Loop southwest approaching Exit 48 - Juarez, Mexico/Zaragoza International Bridge/Zaragoza Road.

item.title: TX-375 Loop - Exits 47 and 48
item.description: TX-375 Loop southwest at Exit 47 - TX-20/FM-258/Alameda Ave./Socorro Road/Pan American Drive. Approaching Exit 48 - Juarez, Mexico/Zaragoza International Bridge/Zaragoza Road.
